mdRecord.dcterms:title: A map of the British and French dominions in North America: With the roads, distances, limits, and extent of the settlements / Humbly inscribed .. Jno. Mitchell
Map of the British colonies in North America
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mitchell, John, 1711-1768 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: col. map. 133 x 193 cm. fold. to 34 x 24 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Inset in upper left hand corner "A new map of Hudson's Bay and Labrador ..." [original]
Scale given in miles or minutes of latitude, English miles, English & French sea-leagues, common French leagues and Dutch miles. [original]
A variant of the second edition of Mitchell's Map of the British colonies in North America, which was published in the same year. [original]
Scale ca. 1:2,100,000; 7/8 in. = 30 miles (English miles); 1 1/16 in. = 30 miles (miles or minutes of latitude) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: North America--Maps
Great Britain--Colonies--America--Maps
France--Colonies--North America--Maps
